title: Inside a bus fleeing Venezuela
text:
Inside a bus fleeing Venezuela 9:12pm IST - 01:22 
Hundreds of Venezuelans are fleeing daily from a country where inflation is forecast to top 2,000 percent this year, many of whom are traveling across South America by bus. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Hundreds of Venezuelans are fleeing daily from a country where inflation is forecast to top 2,000 percent this year, many of whom are traveling across South America by bus.
